metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25269 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in InspIRCd 2 before 2.0.29 and 3 before 3.6.0. Thepgsql module contains a use after free vulnerability. When combined withthe sqlauth or sqloper modules, this vulnerability can be used for remotecrashing of an InspIRCd server by any user able to connect to a server.

criterions.comment: inspircd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
